text.div:
V3 Value SetRoleClassAssociative

A general association between two entities that is neither partitive nor ontological.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a _RoleClassAssociative
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass
    CodeDisplay
    _RoleClassAssociativeRoleClassAssociativeA general association between two entities that is neither partitive nor ontological.

name: v3.RoleClassAssociative
